title: Day 844
content:
# Day 844

I write about the divide and conquer of politics yesterday and then this happens:

![[https://x.com/naval/status/1812257906647273525](https://x.com/naval/status/1812257906647273525)](https://miro.medium.com/1*EeRlKulrwwZXgWnhTlKO0Q.png)

![[https://x.com/skooookum/status/1812255229892583918](https://x.com/skooookum/status/1812255229892583918)](https://miro.medium.com/1*NG3O48R_97AHsR5lEs8ANA.png)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1812265013492732385](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1812265013492732385)](https://miro.medium.com/1*jtzwnk5eFYOrv2bFiE4dTA.png)

![[https://x.com/ShitpostGate/status/1812262722102522241](https://x.com/ShitpostGate/status/1812262722102522241)](https://miro.medium.com/1*MNRaK9dzmIBxWwnl5l8tJg.png)

![[https://x.com/TateTheTalisman/status/1812254868444270960](https://x.com/TateTheTalisman/status/1812254868444270960)](https://miro.medium.com/1*x_1jYcB7LdbDoefuQSLxGg.png)

This man is winning in a landslide, and my admiration for Trump has skyrocketed today. As someone who's never been particularly politically inclined, I find it striking that one President is evading bullets while the other avoids even the most basic cognitive assessments. It's unprecedented to witness a President's life being threatened during my lifetime. May God bless America, a nation that sorely needs it right now.

7/13/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
